alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:57PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nye County through 230 PM PDT... At 155 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Middlegate, or 18 miles northwest of Gabbs, moving north northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
